properties.name: import.error-dir
properties.description: Files to import with an invalid content are moved here

properties.name: import.processed-dir
properties.description: Files, which can be imported successfully are moved here

properties.name: import.base-dir
properties.description: The base directory, where 'statuso' search files to import

properties.name: exchange.api.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the web service for retrieving historical exchange rates data

properties.name: exchange.api.key
properties.description: API key of the web service for retrieving historical exchange rates data

properties.name: spring.caffeine.spec
properties.description: additional data for configuring caffeine, e.g. maximumSize=500, expireAfterWrite=never
